titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate on Ukrainian victory.
A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate on Ukrainian victory.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: This resolution affirms that it is U.S. policy to see Ukraine prevail against the Russian invasion and restored to its internationally recognized 1991 borders. The resolution also states that the peace brought by Ukraine's victory must be secured by integrating Ukraine into NATO and other Euroatlantic institutions.
